thread.section_title: NavePoint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NavePoint | navepoint.com
thread.title: John D.

author: John D.
title: John D.
text: I had trouble finding the TV mounting adapter I needed at the local big box stores. I could get no help from the sales associates with confirming the size of what they had in stock for my TV and existing wall mount or installation. NavePoint had exactly what I needed at half the cost. They confirmed the size and compatibility when I called and referred me to where I can easy installation instructions. They shipped promptly and everything worked out great.
